name: The Fool's Path (Demo)
description:
Start with level 0 then choose your starting characters from a list of recruits. Add to your roster between missions to try all the classes. Characters can be revived once per mission, then perma death.  Take 2 starting characters for normal mode. Take 3 characters for easy mode. The game might stutter a bit when first starting.

Use WASD to move the camera 

Left click a unit to select it, right click draws a path to desired tile, right click again moves unit.

Press R with a unit on top of a fallen ally to revive them once per mission.

You start the missions in free move where movement doesn't cost ap. Once you are spotted by the enemy it becomes the players turn. You then take turns until there are no enemy left. Open the chest before the loot goblin to earn gold and complete the level. Enemies can't see diagonally.
